name: Trust the Dice
description:
Have you ever wondered what a board game looks like from a dice perspective?

In "Trust the Dice" you play as a lucky d20 and get to see the hard work it takes to roll a natural 20.

Controls: How to play the game is shown in the bottom corner while playing.

Levels:  The plan was to have a final air balloon level but I did not compile the final game in time, so it ends after the city escape.

Windows Bugs: The Windows build contains minor bugs, so please use the online version if possible.
